level.text: All vending vehicles equipped with cooking appliances shall have at least one (1) fire extinguisher with a minimum rating of 2A-10BC mounted in the cooking area.
All vending vehicles operating with propane or open flames shall meet the following standards:
All propane compartments shall be secured and placarded;
“No Smoking” signs shall be posted on the vehicle; and
Propane or open flame permits shall be clearly posted on the vehicle.
